title: Introducing: The Judgies
description:
We would love to introduce you to “The Judgies!” - a comedy podcast about hilarious/odd stories from the internet. Listen each week as Christian, Erika and Josh react to weird events in the world and judge accordingly.

apple.co/judgies
Spotify: The Judgies
